Name: Hacker Series
About the game: The Hacker Series contains the 4 original (and first) hacking simulation games developed by exosyphen studios between 2002 and 2006, before the popular Hacker Evolution series. Play the role of a computer hacker in a simulated console environment, in these 4 nostalgic old school classicgames. There are 4 games included in this order: - Blue Sky::Acceptable Casualties, released in 2002 - Digital Hazard, released in 2003 - BS Hacker, released in 2004 - BS Hacker Unlimited, released in 2006
